uk.co.crider.jablus.models.dairy.gui

Class FieldPlanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.crider.jablus.models.dairy.gui.FieldPlanner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CroppingPlanner, GrazingPlanner

    public abstract class FieldPlanner
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a generic planner, involving setting actions in perticular weeks of the year
